title: Login to the website
preconditions: The user has an account on the website
main_flow: The user clicks on the login button
The user is redirected to a login page
4. The user enters their username and password
5. The user clicks on the login button
6. The user is redirected to the home page
7. The user sees the text "Not authorized"
postconditions: The user is either logged in and redirected to the home page or the user is not authorized and sees the text "Not authorized"
